Priority Recommendations: Extend the initial term to 36 months

Term & Renewal.Specific Provisions Analysis: Initial term is only 12 months with no month-to-month renewal option.
Term & Renewal.Improvement Opportunities: Consider extending the initial term and adding flexible renewal options.

Payment & Financial Terms.Specific Provisions Analysis: Net-30 payment terms are not explicitly stated, but late charges are defined.
Payment & Financial Terms.Deviation from Best Practices: Lacks clarity on billing dispute procedures.
Payment & Financial Terms.Improvement Opportunities: Include explicit net-30 terms and a clear dispute resolution process.

Service Level Agreements.Specific Provisions Analysis: No clear service level definitions or credit mechanisms.
Service Level Agreements.Improvement Opportunities: Develop and include specific service level agreements.

Risk Allocation.Specific Provisions Analysis: Limitation of liability is capped at 180 days of charges.
Risk Allocation.Deviation from Best Practices: Exclusion of consequential damages is present but could be clearer.
Risk Allocation.Improvement Opportunities: Clarify the exclusion of consequential damages and enhance insurance requirements.

Operational Terms.Specific Provisions Analysis: Basic operational terms are present but lack detail.
Operational Terms.Deviation from Best Practices: Change management procedures are not defined.
Operational Terms.Improvement Opportunities: Include detailed change management and maintenance notification processes.

Security & Compliance.Specific Provisions Analysis: Data protection measures are minimal and lack specificity.
Security & Compliance.Improvement Opportunities: Enhance data protection and compliance obligations.

Contract Administration.Specific Provisions Analysis: Assignment rights and amendment procedures are included.
Contract Administration.Deviation from Best Practices: Notice requirements could be more detailed.
Contract Administration.Improvement Opportunities: Clarify notice requirements and dispute resolution processes.

Medium-Priority Issues: Lack of clarity in billing dispute procedures

Must-Have Changes: Extend the initial term to 36 months
Strategic Considerations: Consider the impact of term length on customer retention
Implementation Priorities: Prioritize the development of service level agreements
Review and enhance data protection measures
